title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 342 - Filing Of Option Elections Under Article 14 Of The Retirement And Social Security Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 342 - Filing Of Option Elections Under Article 14 Of The Retirement And Social Security Law

State Regulations
§ 342.1 - Background
§ 342.2 - Form; extent of revocability
§ 342.3 - Filing period; service retirement options
§ 342.4 - Comptroller's authority to extend filing period, service retirement options
§ 342.5 - Filing period; disability retirement options
§ 342.6 - Comptroller's authority to extend filing period for disability retirement options where no effective option on file
§ 342.7 - Retirement shall be without optional modification unless timely and effective election filed
§ 342.8 - Election ineffective due to death
§ 342.9 - Withdrawing option elections; choosing a new option

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 342

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§11, 90, 514, 519

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
